== Manjeshwar (CT) (627122) ==

Manjeshwar (CT) is a town in the [[Kasaragod]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 3.98 sq. km. and harbouring 1681 households with total population of 8742 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 29 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 660 km. Male population is 4178 and female population is 4564. Scheduled Caste population is 399 and Scheduled Tribes population is 28. Census Location Code of the town is 627122<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Mangalore(m corp. + og) at a distance of 20 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 204 km. Railway station is at Manjeshwar at a distance of 0 km.
